name: archivebox
tagline: A web archiving tool for capturing and preserving websites with searchable snapshots
description: ArchiveBox is a powerful tool to save and preserve snapshots of websites for long-term archival. It supports input sources like bookmarks, RSS, Pocket, and captures full HTML, media, and PDF exports with searchable UI.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Capture HTML, PDF, screenshots, media, and more. Comprehensive archiving

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Accept bookmarks, RSS feeds, Pocket, and direct URLs. Flexible input

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Web interface for browsing and searching archived content. Find anything quickly

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Store your web archive on your own infrastructure. Complete control

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Export archives in standard formats for portability. Future-proof preservation
